channel.title: Anki on BlackPirateX

item.title: How to use anki beginners guide
item.description: Anki looks scary at first, but you only need a few basics to start learning fast. This guide keeps it simple and practical so you can make your first deck, review daily, and actually stick with it. 1. Install Anki and sync Download Anki for desktop first (Windows/Mac/Linux). The desktop app is where you create and edit cards. Then create a free AnkiWeb account so your cards sync across devices. The mobile apps are optional, but very useful for reviews.
